channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ gives Netflix its first box-office win
item.description: Rival studios on Sunday estimated that the Netflix film, “KPop Demon Hunters” led all films in the box office this weekend with $16-18 million in ticket sales.

item.title: Pentagon says some Guard units in Washington are now carrying firearms. Trump targets more cities
Texas Gov. Abbott says he’ll swiftly sign new maps on his desk that will boost GOP in 2026
